root: ^Good evening. Or whenever it is that you open this. I am Seth Roygan, famed Bob L'ePonge alternative universe writer. I'm excited to share with you my most expansive work yet. Best regards.

^In this evocative retelling of hit television series Bob L'ePonge, live through the romance between Bob and Squi’ward all over again. ~Experience intimate scenes of domestic life from the point-of-view of both iconic lovers. Time can heal all wounds, but only true love can last a lifetime.
